name: John
short: A Narrative driven, point-and-click game set in Scotland during the 70's.
long:
A narrative-driven, point-and-click set in Scotland during the 70's.

You are playing as John Mackilligan. A grieving, manic, enraged, recently laid-off carpet salesman, recounting your crimes to a jury of your peers.

Your wee brother Rab has just died, and you have no way to pay for his funeral.

If the negative symbol were removed from your debt, you'd be swimming in it.

To get his revenge against his ex-boss Mark (and hopefully some cash), John plans to rob and terrorize his home.

One small problem.

He's got the wrong house...
